revised_title: Recent Bibliography on the History of the Royal Society
tldr: This article provides a comprehensive bibliography of recent books and articles related to the history of the Royal Society. It includes works on the lives and contributions of notable scientists such as Erasmus Darwin, Francis Galton, and Henri Becquerel. The bibliography aims to help fellows and researchers explore the rich history of the Royal Society and its impact on scientific development.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > History of Science
